Literature.Title: Discovery of a Novel Antimicrobial Lipopeptide, Brevibacillin V, from Brevibacillus laterosporus fmb70 and Its Application on the Preservation of Skim Milk.
Literature.Author: Wu Y, Zhou L, Lu F, Bie X, Zhao H, Zhang C, Lu Z, Lu Y

Literature.Title: Brevibacillin 2V, a Novel Antimicrobial Lipopeptide With an Exceptionally Low Hemolytic Activity.
Literature.Author: Zhao X, Wang X, Shukla R, Kumar R, Weingarth M, Breukink E, Kuipers OP

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Sheep erythrocytes:8% Hemolysis=512 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=73.1±1.4 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus GIM 1.142(MIC=4µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 21633(MIC=4µg/ml),Bacillus cereus CMCC 63301(MIC=4µg/ml),Vibrio parahaemolyticus ATCC 33847(MIC=4µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=16µg/ml),Shigella flexneri CMCC 51571(MIC=8µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Choleraesuis CICC 21493 (MIC=32µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Heidelberg BEAR097339(MIC=32µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Dublin CICC 21497(MIC=16µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Agona CICC 21586(MIC=32µg/ml),Aspergillus flavus CICC 2062(MIC=256µg/ml),Aspergillus ochraceus CICC 2050(MIC=128µg/ml),Fusarium graminearum CICC 2021(MIC=8µg/ml),Fusarium verticillioides ATCC 38932(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 15975(MIC=1-2µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium LMG 16003(MIC=2µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis LMG 16216(MIC=2µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 14579(MIC=1µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978(MIC=64µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa LMG 6395(MIC=64µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae LMG 20218(MIC=64µg/ml),Human hepatocellular carcinoma HepG2(50-60% Cytotoxicity=9.89±0.67µg/ml)
